['', ' Duty Statement ', 'Work Location', 'Job Type', '# of Positions', ' Research Scientist III (Epi/Bio) ', ' The Research Scientist III (RS III) will provide expert for support of DCDC preparedness, response and recovery from emerging infectious diseases that affect communities and have human health impact. The person in this position will serve as the lead of the DCDC Duty Officer Program. The RS III will serve as the technical writer of operational plans and policy documents for DCDC and CID. The RS III will serve as a technical reviewer for California’s 61 LHDs PHEP-funded pandemic influenza plans and the epidemiology and surveillance work plans. The RS III will represent the DCDC in the Statewide BioWatch Program’s Advisory Committee. The RS III will also work with Division programs and local health departments to identify emerging infections and other public health issues of importance. This position requires Statewide travel up to 10%.', 'Department Information', 'Position #(s)', 'Position Details', ' The California Reportable Disease Information Exchange (CalREDIE) is a secure system that the California Department of Public Health (CDPH) has implemented for electronic disease reporting and surveillance. Specified diseases and conditions are mandated by State laws and regulations to be reported by healthcare providers and laboratories to the public health authorities. The purpose of CalREDIE is to improve the efficiency of surveillance activities and the early detection of public health events through the collection of complete and timely surveillance information on a state wide basis. This allows for 24/7/365 reporting and receipt of notifiable conditions. Local Health Departments (LHDs) and CDPH have access to disease and laboratory reports in near real-time for disease surveillance, public health investigation, and case management activities.', 'Working Title', 'Job Code #', 'Classification', 'This position requires Statewide travel up to 10%.', 'Job Description And Duties']

In the absence of a signed agreement for recruiting or placement services, Bremer will have no obligation and will not agree to pay any referral or recruiting fee. In the event a recruiter or agency submits a candidate for consideration, Bremer explicitly reserves the right to pursue and/or hire any such candidate(s) without any financial or other obligation to the recruiter or agency. Any unsolicited resumes, including those submitted to hiring managers, will be deemed to be the property of Bremer.', 'The Senior Data Engineer designs robust, scalable solutions and data pipelines to automate the ingestion, processing and delivery of all types of data: structured and unstructured, batch, and real-time streaming data. He/She will use their analytical, programming and technical skills to ensure that data ingestion pipelines are scalable, repeatable, secure, and can serve multiple users within Bremer. He/She will facilitate acquiring data from a variety of different sources, getting it in the right formats, assuring that it adheres to data quality standards, and assuring that users can get that data quickly.', '•Strong expertise in software and data engineering and pipeline development.', 'A combination of education and experience generally attained through a bachelor degree in Computer Science or Engineering and 7 or more years of experience with data management technologies, business intelligence technologies, design strategies, and experience with one or more advanced analytics tools. The Senior Data Engineer requires substantial expertise in a broad range of software development and programming fields. It is required to have knowledge of data analysis, end user requirements analysis, and business requirements analysis to develop a clear understanding of the business needs and to incorporate these needs into technical solutions. They have a solid understanding of physical data architecture and design principles. The ability to work well in a team environment is essential. Excellent communication skills and the ability to communicate in a clear and concise manner. Ability to work in a collaborative environment, follow pre-defined patterns and know when exceptions need to be made. Ability to define, communicate and improve development patterns. Understanding of “impact analysis” and how to properly identify potential consequences of a change.', 'Preferred Experience:', 'Notice to Third Party Recruiters', 'Thought Leadership:', 'Thought Leadership: Use holistic approach when problem solving and decision making; proactively seek diverse perspectives to develop synergetic solutions; promote engagement and empowerment; translate complex concepts and challenges into tasks and activities that are quick and easy to achieve; use authority appropriately and acknowledge the contributions of others.', 'Results Leadership: Prioritize strategically by organizing resources, time and people to achieve key goals and objectives; act with a sense of urgency, proactively address critical concerns, work quickly to get things done; lead change effectively; demonstrate knowledge skill and abilities while demonstrating operational excellence; deliver consistent results.', '• Consistently improving and optimizing data models to achieve peak performance across the entire analytics platform', 'The role’s core responsibilities include:', 'This role functions as a core member of an agile team supporting strategic initiatives relying on data to solve complex problems. The Senior Data Engineer is responsible for the software platforms that provides insight from raw data and handles diverse sources of data seamlessly. This role will be responsible for understanding and applying standard and emerging technologies to solve complex business problems leveraging data.', '\xa0', '•Knowledge of SQL on Hadoop technologies such as Hive, Impala or Presto.', '•Familiarity with OLAP concepts and implementation.', '•Experienced in SQL and applying analytical languages like Python, R, Scala.', 'Personal Leadership:', 'Team Leadership:', '• Design and development of key data pipelines and analytic capabilities', '•Knowledge of development standards; ability to follow and implement as needed.', '•Demonstrated understanding of architecture and design of highly available/scalable distributed systems.', 'Qualifications:', '•Experience with functional/event-driven programming.', 'Shared Expectations', '•Knowledge of JVM languages such as Java, Groovy, or Scala.', '•Familiarity with DataOps, and/or knowledge and experience with DevOps.', '• Analyzing and solving complex business problems, breaking down the work into actionable tasks', 'Bremer is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer M/F/Disability/Veteran', 'Team Leadership: Lead strategically with rigor around communicating the what and why behind decisions; demonstrate transparency, honesty and courage to earn a reputation as an authentic leader; communicate a vision and engage team in achieving that vision; drive dedication to serve and promote the client intimacy model; clearly communicate and hold employees to performance expectations providing clear and timely feedback and holding all employees accountable; build high performing teams through engagement and accountability; delegate and draw on others knowledge and expertise; commit to coaching and developing team and next generation of leaders by taking an enterprise point of view.', '•Knowledge of data analytics, visualization and governance.', '•Familiarity with Data Science concepts such as machine learning.', '•Experience in building data analytics solutions on Hadoop stack.', 'The role exists to improve and extend our data processing platforms, including: Build and maintain data pipelines, to clean and process data; Tag and store source information and metadata in a way that will allow us to easily filter and search based on our project demand; Developing and applying methods of data collection, processing, and analyzing large volumes of data to build and enhance products, processes, and systems; Iterate and improve upon a learning system, facilitating the integration and matching of data with requirements, refining models, procedures and modules, learners, and experiment with new approaches; Take ownership of projects, laying the foundation of great code yourself and helping others around you to code to those standards. Work on new products as well on feature enhancements of existing products.', 'Results Leadership:', '•Experience working with large and complex data sets with multi-terabyte scale.', 'Equal Employment Opportunity']

['', '• Working and communicating across a fast-paced cross organizational team.', 'Key Requirements:', "Scientific Bachelor's degree preferred.", '• Experience working in a CLIA or GLP environment preferred.', '• Work with samples which may contain SARS-CoV-2.', 'The successful candidate should be experienced as a Lab technician performing ELISAs, and able to generate reproducible results under the guidance of a senior scientist or lab manager. Good hands, organizational skills, and a keen eye for detail are essential.', 'The Research Associate is also expected to review the data when it is available, and to alert laboratory management of any data or techinal issues.', '• Experience working in a Biological Safety Cabinet required.', '• Ability to handle human specimens with appropriate precautions', 'Our laboratories are developing a high-throughput serologic ELISA method to detect SARS-CoV-2 antibodies in human plasma.\xa0', 'Test samples may contain SARS-CoV-2 so adherence to lab safety procedures is critical.\xa0', '• Ability to rigorously follow SOPs.', '• Clinical diagnostics background preferred.', '• Experience working with lab automation (e.g. Agilent Bravo; Integra ViaFlo, AssistPlus) preferred.', 'The method will be used to assess Key Workers for the presence of antibodies to SARS-CoV-2.', 'Following implementation of the method, the majority of lab work will involve the testing of samples in a semi-automated workflow in 384 well format per standard operating procedures.\xa0', 'We are seeking a highly motivated Research Associate who will support the initial assay optimization and validation activities.\xa0', '• Work with human biological specimens. HepB Vaccination advised.', '• Work in BSL2 laboratory with experience in ELISA or equivalent immunoassays required.', '• California licensure as Clinical Laboratory Scientist (CLS) or Medical Laboratory Technician (MLT).', '• Attention to detail to ensure chain of custody of all samples.', '• Ability to follow laboratory specified documentation practices', '• Ability to follow CAPA (Corrective and Preventive Action) procedures']

['The Genomics and Data Sciences team is looking to hire one genomics scientist for the Eukaryotic Genomics team. The primary responsibility for this role is to build, maintain, and document the variant discovery bioinformatics pipeline in our cloud environment and help partners run projects in this environment. The role will also involve working with IT teams to manage genomic data sets and implement a genome browser for the R&D organization.', '', 'The ideal candidate will have:', 'Communicates well with bioinformaticians and scientists on other teams to understand their bioinformatics needs.', 'Nice to have', '• Experience with AWS cloud computing.', 'Familiarity with GATK4 bioinformatics software, particularly the variant discovery workflow and best practices.', 'Education requirements:', 'Experience working in a cloud environment (e.g. AWS cloud).', 'The ideal candidate will be an independent worker who takes initiative, challenges assumptions, communicates effectively, and has experience running high-throughput genomics pipelines.', 'Proficient with Python and git.', 'Experience constructing durable bioinformatics pipelines that partners can use.', '• Genomics or population genetics background.', 'Masters degree in a relevant field (Genomics, Bioinformatics, Data Science) + 2 years relevant experience.', 'Experience constructing and maintaining bioinformatics workflows.']

We are committed to building an inclusive and diverse environment where everyone’s individuality is respected and everyone has an Identity. In recruiting for new colleagues, we welcome the unique contributions you can bring and encourage you to be your best self.', 'Competitive benefits and perks', 'Well-stocked fridges, whether you’re hungry or thirsty', 'Awesome company culture focused around providing a flexible and collaborative work environment', 'Ability to leverage data visualizations to highlight insights to business partners and make a business case for a recommended action or innovation opportunity']

['', 'Collaborating with the other researchers in Self Care to define the Design Research roadmap for Self Care and acting as the named researcher / point of contact for member / patient research in the US . Collaborate with Data analysts, design and product on what and how to measure success in the product. You will manage your own time based on having an in depth understanding of the strategic and commercial priorities of the tribe and business and knowing how your work ladders up into this - you will prioritise based on what work will bring the biggest benefits and you will be able to succinctly and accurately explain this and your decisions to your team so that they understand the context for their work.You will run your own user research as part of a cross-functional team, but also have the skills and passion to proactively support other team members to do research as and when needed.Flexibly and accurately deploying a number of research methods to understand different user groups. Undertaking strategic and tactical research projects that support problem definition as well as solution refinement.Executing a collaborative research process end-to-end including participant recruitment, creating prototypes and stimuli, and turning insights into actions for product development.Work closely with designers to provide data-driven decisions and collaborate on the creation of research artefacts to use during sessions (i.e. prototypes). Review together research insights to apply to designs.Creating compelling and actionable research deliverables and insights which inspire empathy and drive both pragmatic and innovative solutions.Understanding and taking into account technical and business requirements when running research, including helping articulate how research is prioritised by the team.Building strong relationships at a Tribe level and taking on responsibility for the delivery of high quality and robust design research outcomes.Defining and documenting our Research Operations processes for patient research in the US, working closely with legal and compliance to ensure our methods are rigorous and ethical.Analysing and integrating app analytics, surveys, market research and other quantitative research data as relevant.Actively shaping how we work together and build products.Facilitating brainstorming and working sessions with cross-disciplinary teams.', 'Key Responsibilities', 'You have a passion to build a product that serves humanityYou are compassionate and caring towards others. You respect the views and ideas of others;You work in a straight-forward, collaborative and inclusive way and is non-political;You are tenacious, in the pursuit to delight our users. You strive for excellence in all you do and always look to improve our service and product;You regularly seek to turn ideas into action and inject creativity into every touch point. You question common practice to challenge the norm;Frequently has a can-do attitude and a positive viewpoint;Takes ownership and always delivers against what is agreed.', 'You are tenacious, in the pursuit to delight our users. You strive for excellence in all you do and always look to improve our service and product;', 'You have demonstrable experience of a wide range of evaluative research methods and techniques.', 'You love giving and receiving honest, thoughtful feedback.', 'You support tribe leadership in shaping the future of the product by taking research and turning it into valuable insights that power their decision making.', 'You regularly seek to turn ideas into action and inject creativity into every touch point. You question common practice to challenge the norm;', 'You’re a detail-oriented and effective practitioner that consistently delivers high quality outputs and engaging insights.You have critical thinking and always ask the right questions to make sure the product strives for excellence and everyone gets the best of each research.Able to communicate research effectively, regardless of audience.Passionate about bringing the lens of data and research to the product development process.', 'You are experienced in the execution of multiple mixed-method research approaches. On top of your strong general toolkit, you also have deep specialisation in a few key methods or areas which make you a go-to person in the team:You have demonstrable experience of a wide range of evaluative research methods and techniques.You have led generative or discovery projects for a product or an entire service.You have a wide-reaching understanding of frameworks and psychological principles that you are confident in applying.Familiarity with quantitative research methods, an understanding of metrics and A/B testing, and willingness to integrate quantitative data with qualitative user researchYou proactively and confidently take the lead in syncing up insights across a product area, participating in processes and rituals that help break down silos and socialise cross-functional insights. You take responsibility for sharing insights and creating a strong narrative that ensures people understand what they are building, why, and what impact it will have.', 'Analysing and integrating app analytics, surveys, market research and other quantitative research data as relevant.', 'You have experience evangelising User Research within a growing organisation.', 'Desirable', 'You will manage your own time based on having an in depth understanding of the strategic and commercial priorities of the tribe and business and knowing how your work ladders up into this - you will prioritise based on what work will bring the biggest benefits and you will be able to succinctly and accurately explain this and your decisions to your team so that they understand the context for their work.', 'Essential Qualifications & Experience', 'You have critical thinking and always ask the right questions to make sure the product strives for excellence and everyone gets the best of each research.', 'Familiarity with quantitative research methods, an understanding of metrics and A/B testing, and willingness to integrate quantitative data with qualitative user research', 'You take responsibility for sharing insights and creating a strong narrative that ensures people understand what they are building, why, and what impact it will have.', 'You are experienced in the execution of multiple mixed-method research approaches. On top of your strong general toolkit, you also have deep specialisation in a few key methods or areas which make you a go-to person in the team:', 'You work in a straight-forward, collaborative and inclusive way and is non-political;', 'You will run your own user research as part of a cross-functional team, but also have the skills and passion to proactively support other team members to do research as and when needed.', "You have at least four years' experience leading User Research to aid product development in fast-paced agile cross-functional teams.", 'Frequently has a can-do attitude and a positive viewpoint;', 'Key Skills Required', 'Executing a collaborative research process end-to-end including participant recruitment, creating prototypes and stimuli, and turning insights into actions for product development.', 'As well as your craft skills, you are beginning to hone your leadership skills and scale your impact through advising, guiding and reviewing the work of others. You have the confidence to say no to work that you feel compromises ethics or quality, escalating concerns on behalf of yourself and your team where appropriate. ', ' Proven ability in technical writing skills ', "Immediate openings, full benefits and relocation package available! PPD is a leading global contract research organization providing comprehensive, integrated drug development, laboratory and lifecycle management services.\u202f At PPD, we are passionate, deliberate, and driven by our purpose- to improve health!\u202f\u202fEnvision a workplace where you have a direct impact on improving health, work alongside expert scientists, use newest technologies and collaborate with industry thought leaders and therapeutic experts. Welcome to PPD® Laboratories, where science is our passion, quality is our commitment and people are the cornerstone of our success.\u202fAs an Associate Research Scientist you will be responsible for the regulatory and scientific conduct of development, validation, stability projects, and/or other specialty technologies such as extractable/leachable studies.At PPD we hire the best, develop ourselves and each other, and\u202frecognize\u202fthe power of being one team.\u202fWe\u202foffer continued career advancement opportunities, award winning training and benefits focused on the health and wellbeing of our employees.\u202f\u202fSummarized PurposeResponsible for the regulatory and scientific conduct of development, validation, stability projects, and/or other specialty technologies such as extractable/leachable studies. Performs troubleshooting on multiple analytical instrumentation and multiple detection techniques (ELISA, UV), calculates and interprets data, and records data in adherence with PPD SOPs and any additional requirements specific to the lab and / or client. Routinely acts as the technical project leader for multiple projects, interacts with clients on a weekly basis (or as needed) to provide updates, reviews and evaluates data, writes reports and protocols.Essential Functions:\u202f\u202f  Independently performs analytical testing, method optimization/validation, and/or other specialty technologies studies OR method transfers for pharmaceutical and biopharmaceutical compounds in a variety of formulations and/or delivery systems. Understands and conforms to methods, and protocols applicable to assigned tasks. Designs and executes experiments independently.   Reviews and critiques study protocols, project status reports, final study reports and other project-related technical documents.   Prepares and reviews study protocols, project status reports, final study reports and other project-related technical documents.   Communicates data and technical issues to clients on a weekly basis (or as needed).   Provides technical guidance and training to staff.   Leads analytical (procedural and instrumental) troubleshooting sessions.   Assists in preparation and implementation of SOPs and quality systems.   Reviews, interprets, and analyzes data for technical, quality and compliance to protocols, methods, SOPs, client criteria and Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) or Good Laboratory Practices (GLP). Performs self and peer review of the data for accuracy and compliance with reporting requirements prior to submission to QA and issuance to customers.  Job QualificationEducation and Experience:\u202f\u202fBachelor's degree or equivalent and relevant formal academic / vocational qualification, PhD PreferredPrevious experience that provides the knowledge, skills, and abilities to perform the job (comparable to 6+ years).In some cases an equivalency, consisting of a combination of appropriate education, training and/or directly related experience, will be considered sufficient for an individual to meet the requirements of the role.Knowledge, Skills and Abilities:\u202f\u202f  Knowledge and research experience in immunology or virology preferred   Ability to independently perform root cause analysis for method investigations   Proficiency on technical operating systems   Proven problem solving and troubleshooting abilities   Proven ability in technical writing skills   Time management and project management skills   Good written and oral communication skills   Ability to work in a collaborative work environment with a team   Ability to train junior staff  Working Environment:\u202f\u202fPPD values the health and wellbeing of our employees. We support and encourage individuals to create a healthy and balanced environment where they can thrive.\u202f Below is listed the working environment/requirements for this role:\u202f  Able to communicate, receive, and understand information and ideas\u202fwith diverse groups of people\u202fin a comprehensible and reasonable manner.\u202f   Able\u202fto work upright and stationary and/or standing\u202ffor typical working hours.\u202f\u202f   Able to lift and move objects up to 25 pounds\u202f\u202f   Able to work in non-traditional work environments.\u202f\u202f   Able to use and learn standard office equipment and technology\u202fwith proficiency.\u202f\u202f   May have exposure to potentially hazardous elements, including infectious agents, typically found in healthcare or laboratory environments.\u202f   Able to perform successfully under pressure while prioritizing and handling multiple projects or activities.\u202f  PPD Defining Principles:\u202f", ' Communicates data and technical issues to clients on a weekly basis (or as needed). ['', 'Collaborative team player with ability to work across engineering & data science teams', 'Experience with AWS technologies such as EC2, EMR, RDS, S3, Athena, Lambda', 'Why make the move:', 'Senior Backend Data Engineer with minimum 5+ years of experience in production level software design and development.Bachelor’s or advanced degree in computer science, mathematics, or related discipline.\xa0Solid development skills with Java, Spark, API design, big data technologies and databases like PostgreSQL, ElasticSearch, DynamoDB.Experience building and maintaining performant, fault-tolerant, scalable and distributed data and ETL pipelines.Experience with AWS technologies such as EC2, EMR, RDS, S3, Athena, LambdaCollaborative team player with ability to work across engineering & data science teamsExperience with geospatial data is usefulAbility to write high-quality code that is maintainable, clear, and concise.Enjoy working in an Agile environment.', 'I', 'Experience with geospatial data is useful', 'Plethora of snacks and drinks, subsidized lunches, and free lunch Fridays where people are encouraged to get to know other people in the company.', 'Senior Backend Data Engineer with minimum 5+ years of experience in production level software design and development.', 'Ranked as one of the top places to work in the Seattle area for multiple years.', 'Why INRIX?', 'A boat on Lake Washington. You get your license and we’ll pay for the gas.', 'Who we are looking for:\xa0', 'The people and passion. Meet and work with people that are smart, helpful, and love what they’re doing and geek out on it. Have the opportunity to make a big impact to both the company and our customers.', '\xa0', 'Enjoy working in an Agile environment.', 'Bachelor’s or advanced degree in computer science, mathematics, or related discipline.\xa0', 'Solid development skills with Java, Spark, API design, big data technologies and databases like PostgreSQL, ElasticSearch, DynamoDB.', 'INRIX Analytics is building and expanding several new products and needs a top-notch Senior Java Backend Developer with a focus on Data/ETL engineering.', 'Experience building and maintaining performant, fault-tolerant, scalable and distributed data and ETL pipelines.', 'Ranked as one of the top places to work in the Seattle area for multiple years.Competitive Salary, Benefits, and 401K matching.No policy vacation policy.Plethora of snacks and drinks, subsidized lunches, and free lunch Fridays where people are encouraged to get to know other people in the company.A boat on Lake Washington. You get your license and we’ll pay for the gas.The people and passion. Meet and work with people that are smart, helpful, and love what they’re doing and geek out on it. Have the opportunity to make a big impact to both the company and our customers.', 'NRIX has an unmatched world-wide collection of GPS data from connected cars, fleet vehicles, and mobile devices.\xa0The Analytics Team is racing to meet customer demand for new insights.\xa0Our tools provide data-driven answers to everyone’s questions about traffic, populations, and businesses.\xa0We help transportation managers measure commute times, manage congestion, and fix traffic signals.\xa0We help cities track freight movement, plan public transit, and reduce the impact of construction.\xa0We help businesses understand where their customers come from, and select the best site for their next store.\xa0', 'INRIX is a small company that thrives on innovation with many tangible and intangible benefits that differ from some of the big companies in the area.', 'No policy vacation policy.', 'INRIX is the global leader in connected car services and smart cities, a new approach that leverages big data and the cloud to help manage urban mobility. Our products are used by the top automakers, governments, mobile operators, developers, advertisers, as well as enterprises large and small. We are literally everywhere with over 450 customers across 60 countries.', 'Ability to write high-quality code that is maintainable, clear, and concise.', 'Competitive Salary, Benefits, and 401K matching.', 'We take career development very seriously. Part of our goal is to invest in you. We will support you and help you get better in your craft. We also expect you to teach us a few things along the way.', 'If you want the opportunity to build novel products, get your hard work into production, and be thanked by eager customers, INRIX is the place for you.\xa0Our product teams are empowered to work directly with customers and our strong Sales team to decide which products to build, and how to build them.\xa0Everyone makes a difference here.']

['', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Senior candidates must demonstrate a track record of successful technical leadership in the execution of large-scale data projects.\xa0', 'Nice to have:', 'Provide tooling and automation for infrastructure, continuous testing, and continuous deploy of data systems\xa0', 'Experience with establishing well-organized data lakes\xa0', 'Design and implement scalable data workflows and pipelines, and integrate diverse data sources and sinks\xa0', 'Experience with AWS data stack – Redshift, Athena, EMR, Kinesis, DocumentDB, DynamoDB\xa0Experience with establishing well-organized data lakes\xa0Experience setting up and optimizing data warehouses\xa0Background in data modeling and performance tuning in relational and no-SQL databases\xa0Experience with data practices (security, data management and governance)\xa0Experience in operations research, machine learning or optimization', 'Work with the platform operations team to monitor and maintain live production systems\xa0', 'As part of the Avail Data Engineering team, you will be working to manage our ever-growing collection of vehicle sharing and usage data. We support our business analytics and marketing teams by performing data integration and ETL between an increasingly diverse set of data sources and our data warehouse. We will also build big-data applications leveraging techniques from operations research and machine learning to directly enrich, personalize and optimize the Avail car-sharing product. This is a green field opportunity to contribute to the design and implementation of a flexible, scalable data framework for an exciting new sector of the sharing economy.\xa0This position can be based in either of two Avail HQ offices at San Francisco or Chicago, or fully remote with semi-regular travel to SF HQ.\xa0', 'Ability to thrive in a fast paced, cross regional, diverse, and dynamic work environment\xa0', 'Avail is a new peer-to-peer car sharing services. There are currently 3 lines of business. Avail at Airport is a car sharing service that connects local travelers who own cars with travelers who need to borrow a car. Avail at Apartments is a new soon to be launched business that provides car sharing within their Apartment community. The third line of business is being designed but would be equally disruptive.', 'Big Data Engineering – Experience in building scalable data pipelines involving machine learning, optimization or prediction\xa0', '\xa0', 'Design appropriate database schemas and optimize database deployment architectures for analytics query loads\xa0', 'Nice to have:\xa0', 'Implement data transforms and organization for various data stores (data lakes and warehouses)\xa0', 'Software Engineering – Level-appropriate experience in software engineering and SDLC (our stack may include Python, Golang and Scala). Must consider code readability, reuse, and extensibility a priority when developing solutions.\xa0', 'Background in data modeling and performance tuning in relational and no-SQL databases\xa0', 'Various experience levels considered. Junior candidates must have a strong background of coursework or academic projects around data engineering or machine learning at scale or have appropriate industry experience contributing to such projects.\xa0Senior candidates must demonstrate a track record of successful technical leadership in the execution of large-scale data projects.\xa0Software Engineering – Level-appropriate experience in software engineering and SDLC (our stack may include Python, Golang and Scala). Must consider code readability, reuse, and extensibility a priority when developing solutions.\xa0Big Data Engineering – Experience in building scalable data pipelines involving machine learning, optimization or prediction\xa0Big Data Devops – Experience in performing operations and automation of various big-data ecosystems in production environments on AWS or a related cloud service\xa0Ability to thrive in a fast paced, cross regional, diverse, and dynamic work environment\xa0', 'Experience with AWS data stack – Redshift, Athena, EMR, Kinesis, DocumentDB, DynamoDB\xa0', 'Design and implement scalable data workflows and pipelines, and integrate diverse data sources and sinks\xa0Design appropriate database schemas and optimize database deployment architectures for analytics query loads\xa0Implement data transforms and organization for various data stores (data lakes and warehouses)\xa0Design and implement new platform architectures for building and serving machine learning models\xa0Work with the platform operations team to monitor and maintain live production systems\xa0Provide tooling and automation for infrastructure, continuous testing, and continuous deploy of data systems\xa0', 'Design and implement new platform architectures for building and serving machine learning models\xa0', 'Big Data Devops – Experience in performing operations and automation of various big-data ecosystems in production environments on AWS or a related cloud service\xa0', 'Various experience levels considered. Junior candidates must have a strong background of coursework or academic projects around data engineering or machine learning at scale or have appropriate industry experience contributing to such projects.\xa0', 'Experience setting up and optimizing data warehouses\xa0', 'Requirements:\xa0', 'Experience in operations research, machine learning or optimization', 'Experience with data practices (security, data management and governance)\xa0']

['engineering', ' ', 'This position is remote.', 'MUD\\WTR is looking for a self-directed Software + Data Engineer with passion and experience for e-commerce to join our engineering squad comprised of a small + talented team led by CTO & Head of Product Jonathan Crawford, former Founder/CEO of Storenvy. From data insights to retention tactics, we pride ourselves on getting a lot done with a little team and creating hundreds of thousands of happy customers. As an engineer, you will be working closely with CTO, Product, Design, and Customer Support teams to collaboratively cultivate the evolution of our best-in-class digital product experience. This is not a standard engineering role as so much of the work involved is engineering\xa0ways to achieve our technical and product goals without directly writing code or hosting our own app. (Personally, I find it to be an extremely interesting technical challenge — Jonathan). Our headquarters is in Venice, CA but our team spans the globe with 90% of our team working remotely. Join us in our mission to improve human existence through what we put in our mug. ']

', 'Experience with engineering cell lines for a variety of purposes using both random and targeted molecular techniques', 'Experience in biologics production and/or QC', 'Company Information', 'Ph.D. in recombinant molecular biology intensive fieldAt least 6 years of experience in mammalian gene expression cassette design, synthesis, and testingExperience in recombinant DNA assembly methodology, including Gibson Assembly, PCR, conventional restriction enzyme digestion & ligation, and facilitated recombination (i.e., Gateway cloning) methodologyExperience leading and managing laboratory scientists and techniciansStrong cross-functional leadership skills including refined verbal and written communication skillsStrong computational skills and experience with a broad spectrum of DNA sequence analysis tools', 'Experience in recombinant DNA assembly methodology, including Gibson Assembly, PCR, conventional restriction enzyme digestion & ligation, and facilitated recombination (i.e., Gateway cloning) methodology', 'The Senior Scientist is responsible for the synthesis, quality control, and production of novel plasmid DNA molecules to be used in therapeutic, CMC, and analytical applications. Demonstrate an excellent understanding of nucleic acid enzymology and biology and strong experience engineering novel DNA sequences for experimental and/or therapeutic applications in mammalian systems. Lead and participate in cross-functional genetic therapies teams across Vertex, to advance our understanding of the science of gene therapy vector manufacture and performance.', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' In June 2019, Vertex announced the establishment of a new research site in the Boston area where research, development, and clinical manufacturing for cell and genetic therapies will be primarily based. Cell and genetic therapies represent two rapidly emerging therapeutic modalities with the potential to treat—and even cure—several of the diseases Vertex is focused on, including sickle cell disease, Duchenne muscular dystrophy and type 1 diabetes. Further investment in a research site specifically designed to advance these programs will be key to Vertex’s continued and sustained leadership in these exciting approaches. At Vertex Cell and Genetic Therapies (VCGT) our research teams will bring together the best biology, technologies and enhanced manufacturing capabilities to ensure we bring these cutting-edge transformative therapies to patients as quickly as possible. ', 'Basic Qualifications:• Bachelor’s Degree in a scientific discipline ', 'Key Responsibilities and Accountabilities include, but not limited to:', '$22/hr', 'Kelly Services is seeking a Lab Technician\xa0for one of our leading clients in Charolette NC. ', 'Paper Coatings Lab Technician', 'Basic Qualifications:', '$22/hr 1 year contract ', 'Key Responsibilities and Accountabilities include, but not limited to:• Supports Laboratory colleagues, Technical Specialists, and the Technical Manager with day to day laboratory testing and data summary.• Conducts testing per established SOP’s in a consistent, reproducible, and reliable scientist approach• Conducts benchmarking evaluations to compare  products vs competition and is proactive in recognizing the value propositions • Support R&D efforts of new product development once the project reaches the commercialization phase.• Demonstrates the ability to work on multiple projects using good time management skills• Ability to effectively communicate test data and other observations of the project to their peers and managers.• Performs all work and other duties in compliance with EH&S and ISO standards.• Conducts work at all with safety in mind. ['', 'Responsibilities Will Include', 'Research strategy – Under the overall guidance of the PI, lead a collaborative process to develop a program of quantitative, qualitative, and mixed methods strategy – Collaborate with Program, Implementation, and Policy Directors to ensure that the research strategy and outputs are aligned with the overall activities and goals of the broader NCDI Poverty a system of regular follow-up to ensure timely progress towards achieving the research goals.Study design – Provide guidance on design of research studies that will yield robust and meaningful results and contribute to the evidence base required for successful implementation, evaluation, adaptation, and potential scale-up of integrated care delivery models for severe NCDs and injuries.Mentorship – in developing and implementing a publishing agenda for the research outputs of both the Boston-based team and site-based researchers, including identifying topic.Grant development – In collaboration with Dr. Bukhman and other staff, identify opportunities and develop research grant applications related to integration science and NCD service delivery at the sites for submission to NIH and similar ['', ' Use data from multiple sources (e.g. user research, on-site testing, VOC tools, business intelligence tools) to develop insights and recommendations for improving our site performance.', ' This position will provide significant input into decisions that shape customer experience, optimization plans, site design and product development.', ' Significant experience with multiple user research methodologies that span the product development life cycle from conceptualization to launch, such as lab studies, field research, iterative prototype testing, and surveys/questionnaires.', ' Who You Are ', ' Demonstrated ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects with varying degrees of complexity with significant financial implication.', ' Responsible for designing, planning, recruiting and conducting user research, including methods such as: usability lab studies, ethnographic field studies, competitive evaluations, participatory design sessions, surveys, heuristic evaluations, cognitive walkthroughs and similar approaches.', ' Training in capabilities and limitations of research methods', ' 5 - 7 years working in user experience research with demonstrated specific examples of impact, and experience working alongside Product Managers, Product Designers, and Developers.', ' Participate in vendor selection as needed.', ' Demonstrated experience with research design and statistical analysis including issues related to hypothesis testing – in particular sample size evaluation and confidence in results.', ' 5 - 7 years working in user experience research with demonstrated specific examples of impact, and experience working alongside Product Managers, Product Designers, and Developers. B.A. in Human-Computer Interaction, Human Factors, Psychology, or related social science, or equivalent graduate-level work; Masters degree considered an asset. Training in capabilities and limitations of research methods Mixed methods approach preferred Significant experience with multiple user research methodologies that span the product development life cycle from conceptualization to launch, such as lab studies, field research, iterative prototype testing, and surveys/questionnaires. Demonstrated experience with research design and statistical analysis including issues related to hypothesis testing – in particular sample size evaluation and confidence in results. Ability to look for solutions and information in creative ways and convey complicated results and insights to people of varying backgrounds Demonstrated ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects with varying degrees of complexity with significant financial implication. Strong written and spoken communication skills. Experience working with e-commerce and/or b2b businesses preferred but not required.', ' Mixed methods approach preferred', ' Create clear, unbiased presentations which highlight the impact of the customer experience on business results and work with the team to leverage customer information to improve user experience, increase revenue, decrease cost, and steer ecommerce and product design.', ' Experience working with e-commerce and/or b2b businesses preferred but not required.', ' Strong written and spoken communication skills.', ' Partner with technology, ecommerce, marketing, program management and marketing communications to represents user needs during product definition, requirements gathering, project planning, UI design and product launch.', ' Keep up to date with UX research techniques and emerging research tools.', ' Ability to look for solutions and information in creative ways and convey complicated results and insights to people of varying backgrounds', " What You'll Need ", ' Your Next Challenge ', ' This position will provide significant input into decisions that shape customer experience, optimization plans, site design and product development. Responsible for designing, planning, recruiting and conducting user research, including methods such as: usability lab studies, ethnographic field studies, competitive evaluations, participatory design sessions, surveys, heuristic evaluations, cognitive walkthroughs and similar approaches. Use data from multiple sources (e.g. user research, on-site testing, VOC tools, business intelligence tools) to develop insights and recommendations for improving our site performance. Partner with technology, ecommerce, marketing, program management and marketing communications to represents user needs during product definition, requirements gathering, project planning, UI design and product launch. Create clear, unbiased presentations which highlight the impact of the customer experience on business results and work with the team to leverage customer information to improve user experience, increase revenue, decrease cost, and steer ecommerce and product design. Participate in vendor selection as needed. Keep up to date with UX research techniques and emerging research tools.', ' B.A. in Human-Computer Interaction, Human Factors, Psychology, or related social science, or equivalent graduate-level work; Masters degree considered an asset.']

['', 'Data mining experience with large security data sets such as IDS, IPS and firewall logs', 'Position:', 'Identify emerging threats by leveraging Zscaler’s existing data mining tools as well as our cloud based infrastructure to protect our customersDevelop unique tools and utilizing them to automate the process of identifying threatsArticulate findings of our customers through blogging, media interviews and speaking engagements with strong writing/speaking skills and be comfortable presenting findings to both internal and external audiencesExercise strong technical knowledge of web-based threats, and live to identify the next attack vector, no matter how deep it’s hidden', 'Why Zscaler?', ' US Citizenship is required **For over 10 years, Zscaler has been disrupting and transforming the security industry. Ask yourself: Do you want to team with the best talent in the industry? Do you want to work on disruptive technology? Do you thrive in a fluid work environment? Do you appreciate a company culture that enables individual and group success and celebrates achievement? If you said yes, we’d love to talk to you about joining our award-winning team.Learn more at zscaler.com or follow us on Twitter @zscaler. Additional information about Zscaler (NASDAQ : ZS ) is available at http://www.zscaler.com. ['Unique new Finance Manager opportunity. This is a HYBRID role, not just in FP&A, but also covering strategy, planning, operations, and data analytics, with a construction company that runs like a tech co./data analytics start-up. Yes, this is not the norm, and that is exactly why this company has been so successful, is slammed with projects, and has become the largest luxury builder on the Eastside in a short time. Working under a talented young CFO, and sensational peers, you will be the right hand to the CFO, undertaking a ton of new projects (role can develop into a project-based position). You will partner closely with operations (construction team, PM’s), sales & marketing, to help them build out an infrastructure for reporting, analytics, metrics and KPI’s. This role covers strategic planning – company-wide, and helping to shore up metrics and KPI’s, with the co. being so big on data analytics to drive processes and decisions. You will also supervise the Data Scientist, assigning projects to go next level with business insight. With a lot of these tangents, you will still be rooted in FP&A. Comp range $110-125K + bonus, convenient Eastside location, free parking, work remote thru COVID, room for growth. Looking for 5+ years, smaller-mid-size co., broad-scope experience, excellent communication skills.']

company: University of South Florida College of Arts and Sciences
job_text: ['', 'The Dungrawala lab utilizes a diverse array of approaches including but not limited to genetics, molecular biology, biochemistry and proteomics. Applicants with a recent Ph.D. in Biochemistry/Molecular Biology with a strong working knowledge in mammalian cell systems are encouraged to apply.', 'Salary is commensurate with\xa0NIH\xa0guidelines.', 'A postdoctoral position is available immediately to study regulatory aspects of\xa0DNA\xa0replication and repair in human cells. We seek an outstanding and highly motivated individual to participate in a research team studying mechanisms of replication stress response. The central areas of investigation include: 1) Mechanistic analysis of the factors regulating stalled fork protection. 2) Discovery and analysis of replication stress response proteins. 3) Elucidation of post translational modifications at damaged replication factories and its relevance in cancer models.', 'Please send via email curriculum vitae, a statement why you are interested in our research group, and names of three references to Huzefa Dungrawala, Ph.D., Department of Cell, Microbiology and Molecular Biology; email:\xa0hdungrawala@usf.edu. Applications will be reviewed immediately.', 'University of South Florida is one of the leading research universities in the nation. As a Preeminent university,\xa0USF\xa0provides state-of-the-art facilities and includes researchers from diverse scientific backgrounds. The\xa0CMMB\xa0(Cell, Microbiology and Molecular Biology) department includes highly-trained faculty that study multiple aspects within research topics attributed to Genome Integrity and Mechanisms of Aging and Structural and Computational Biology. The\xa0CMMB\xa0department is also in close proximity to Moffitt Cancer Center,\xa0USF\xa0Health and Center for Drug Discovery and Innovation. The city of Tampa is vibrant, family-friendly with affordable housing, and has sunny-skies round the year.\xa0']

['Required Experience/Skills: ', 'This position is integrated into the development team and responsible for research and development around algorithm strategies, pricing signals, and TCA.  The position also will work with salespeople and clients to explain and customize our execution offering. ', 'Experience working with data/statistical analysis software like Excel, R and Matlab, and familiarity with data visualization tools and techniques. ', 'Performing quantitative research, analysis and development on\xa0\xa0Group’s electronic/algorithmic execution trading systems. Use statistical/mathematical techniques and knowledge of US equity market structure (and microstructure) to design new trading algorithms and systems, and improve existing ones, with the goal of providing ‘best execution’ on client orders executed thru our systems. The research tasks involve developing research plans, extensive data analysis (usually with large amounts of data on orders, trades and market data) and documenting outcomes as reports and white papers. The development tasks require writing robust software using good design principles and follow practices like continuous integration for efficient development cycles. ', 'Experience researching large data sets related to trading (tick/market data, orders and trades) is a plus. ', 'Required Experience/Skills:', 'Candidate should be self-motivated, and have the ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and work well in a collaborative team environment. ', 'Bachelor or a Master’s degree in Computer Science, with an advanced degree in a quantitative field like Statistics, Financial Mathematics, Operations Research, Machine Learning, or a directly related field. 2-5 years of experience in software development and 1-3 years in quantitative analysis (statistical analysis - regression analysis, time series analysis and/or machine learning). Strong object oriented design and programming skills using Java (or similar object oriented programming language) is required, with good knowledge of using efficient data structures. Experience working with data/statistical analysis software like Excel, R and Matlab, and familiarity with data visualization tools and techniques. Experience researching large data sets related to trading (tick/market data, orders and trades) is a plus. Knowledge of equity market micro-structure and TCA techniques is a plus. Candidate should be self-motivated, and have the ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and work well in a collaborative team environment. Familiarity with some or all of these technologies is required - JUnit testing, Unix environment, multi-threaded programming and NoSQL databases.', 'NEW YORK ', 'The development tasks require writing robust software using good design principles and follow practices like continuous integration for efficient development cycles. ', 'Performing quantitative research, analysis and development on\xa0\xa0Group’s electronic/algorithmic execution trading systems. ', 'Data Scientist ', 'FULL-TIME ', 'Use statistical/mathematical techniques and knowledge of US equity market structure (and microstructure) to design new trading algorithms and systems, and improve existing ones, with the goal of providing ‘best execution’ on client orders executed thru our systems. ', 'Knowledge of equity market micro-structure and TCA techniques is a plus. ', 'Familiarity with some or all of these technologies is required - JUnit testing, Unix environment, multi-threaded programming and NoSQL databases.', 'Position Description', 'Strong object oriented design and programming skills using Java (or similar object oriented programming language) is required, with good knowledge of using efficient data structures. ', 'Data Scientist', 'The research tasks involve developing research plans, extensive data analysis (usually with large amounts of data on orders, trades and market data) and documenting outcomes as reports and white papers. ', ' ', 'Bachelor or a Master’s degree in Computer Science, with an advanced degree in a quantitative field like Statistics, Financial Mathematics, Operations Research, Machine Learning, or a directly related field. ', 'Position Description ', '2-5 years of experience in software development and 1-3 years in quantitative analysis (statistical analysis - regression analysis, time series analysis and/or machine learning). ']

['', 'Keywords', 'Exceptional literature review and report generation skills Excellent problem-solving, organizational, analytical and critical thinking skills Excellent communication skills and interpersonal relationship skills including negotiating and relationship management skills with ability to drive achievement of objectives Proven expertise in MS Office; analytical equipment system (e.g., ChemStation, Empower, etc.); citation management software (e.g. EndNote) Ability to manage confidential information with discretion Knowledge of Environmental Health and Safety and Quality guidelines Strict attention to detail and project management skills', 'Writing material characterization reports for a diverse range of medical devices. These reports assess the raw material chemical makeup and manufacturing processes to identify potential extractables, ensure compliance with ISO 10993-18 chemical characterization, and serve as an invaluable resource for L&E chemistry and toxicology teams.', " Education: Bachelor's Degree in Materials Science, Polymer Chemistry, Chemistry, Chemical Engineering, or related field with 6 years of experience required, or Master's Degree in the indicated field with 4 years of experience required, or PhD in the indicated field with 2 years of experience required. The candidate should have experience in the medical device industry or pharmaceutical industry (or relevant university experience), and possess a familiarity with common biomedical materials as well as manufacturing, cleaning, and sterilization processes. Experience in material selection and reformulation efforts are a plus but not required.", 'Essential Job Functions', 'The candidate should have experience in the medical device industry or pharmaceutical industry (or relevant university experience), and possess a familiarity with common biomedical materials as well as manufacturing, cleaning, and sterilization processes. Experience in material selection and reformulation efforts are a plus but not required.', 'Top Requirements/skills', " Writing material characterization reports for a diverse range of medical devices. These reports assess the raw material chemical makeup and manufacturing processes to identify potential extractables, ensure compliance with ISO 10993-18 chemical characterization, and serve as an invaluable resource for L&E chemistry and toxicology teams. Providing consulting support on questions of materials formulations such as polymeric and metallic products, coatings, polymer additives, pigments/dyes, surface treatment agents, surfactants, solvents, processing aids, etc. Assisting in understanding materials formulations, ingredient concentrations and, importantly, illustrating how the constituent elements interact with a wide variety of chemical treatments, manufacturing processes, and sterilization modalities Supporting different business units in materials selection and management, giving guidance on material compatibility with different chemicals and processes Assisting in the critical review and understanding of leachable/extractable profiles, and support in identifying root cause analysis for process product failures, non-conformances, and CAPA. ['', 'Participate in all aspects of Software Quality Assurance including development, testing and deployment as needed.', 'Strong ability to identify deficiencies and any negative user impacts.', 'This position is for establishing and performing testing procedures to ensure 605 data sets are of the highest quality and to ensure end user requirements are met by core 605 processes based on updates to code, environment and usage.', 'High proficiency in SQL, Python and data analytics.', 'Team player attitude a must.', 'Experience in the audience measurement and/or advertising industry.', '2-3 years’ experience in a data analysis role and environment, with a strong emphasis on data quality.', 'Competence in Microsoft Office tools including Excel, Word and Powerpoint.', 'Provide technical support as needed to end users.', 'SQL (queries, pulling data)', 'Additional Notes:', 'Knowledge of technical environments, comfortable with team development lifecycles of development, UAT testing and deployment of code.', 'Excellent team skills required to resolve and diagnose technical issues.', 'Preferred Skills:', 'Required Skills :', 'Proficiency in Quality Assurance tools such as Test Rails or HP ALM/Quality Center.', 'Responsible for identifying and tracking data quality issues associated with key 605 datasets.', 'Basic Qualifications :', 'Engage engineering teams and vendors when necessary to resolve inquiries and issues associated with 605 datasets.', 'Data Quality and Analysis', 'City :Syosset, NY ( WILL BE REMOTE TILL COVID CLEARS)', 'DURATION: 18+ MONTHS', 'Provide insights on the impact of viewership trends from real-world events.', '\xa0', "Bachelor's degree or Associates degree with commensurate experience.", 'Job Description :', 'Excellent communication skills (verbal and written).', 'ob Title :Data Analyst/DATA ENGINEER- Python', 'Experience in the US television industry.', 'Escalate any issues as noted in the testing procedure. ['', ' Build, develop and maintain data models, reporting systems, data automation systems, dashboards and performance metrics that support and inform key business decisions ', 'EEO Statement', ' 10+ years’ experience with data science and advanced analytics with proven record for delivery of data-driven insights to inform strategic decision making; PhD (preferred) or MS in advanced analytics or quantitative discipline such as Statistics, Math or Engineering, or equivalent industry experience; FSA a plus ', ' Examine, interpret and report results of analytical initiatives to stakeholders in leadership, technology, distribution, marketing, operations, underwriting, finance, and product teams ', ' And much more!EEO StatementPacific Life Insurance Company is an Equal Opportunity /Affirmative Action Employer, M/F/D/V. If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you have the right to request an accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access our career center as a result of your disability. To request an accommodation, contact a Human Resources Representative at Pacific Life Insurance Company.', ' Experience with big data tools such as Teradata, Aster, Hadoop, Spark, etc.; deep understanding of and experience using analytical concepts and statistical techniques: hypothesis development, designing tests/experiments, analyzing data, drawing conclusions, and developing actionable recommendations for business units ', 'Factors for Success ', ' Communicate results and business impacts of insight initiatives to stakeholders within and outside of the Division ', 'Full Time / Part Time', ' Experience and knowledge of statistical modeling techniques: GLM multiple regression, logistic regression, log-linear regression, variable selection, etc. ', ' Competitive salary and bonus program ', 'What You’ll Do', 'Job Description', 'Tech & Tools You’ll Use', ' Medical, dental, and vision as part our commitment in investing in the health and wellbeing of our employees ', 'Position Location(s)', ' Create advanced data models and high-quality analysis for all aspects of our business to discover insights, drive outcomes, actionable recommendations and innovation to guide strategic decisions  Establish and promote a clear and transparent framework for developing, testing, and scaling actionable insights resulting in measurable business impact  Partner with key stakeholders to champion an insights-driven culture for the entire division; partner with data science and infrastructure peers and operational managers throughout PL to identify data gaps, improve data quality, and share advanced modeling techniques and learnings  Build, develop and maintain data models, reporting systems, data automation systems, dashboards and performance metrics that support and inform key business decisions  Oversee the design and delivery of reports and insights that analyze business functions and key operations and performance metrics  Manage and optimize processes for data intake, validation, mining and engineering as well as modeling, visualization and communication deliverables  Examine, interpret and report results of analytical initiatives to stakeholders in leadership, technology, distribution, marketing, operations, underwriting, finance, and product teams  Oversee the data/report requests process: tracking requests submitted, prioritization, approval, etc.; develop and implement quality controls and departmental standards to ensure quality standards, organizational expectations, and regulatory requirements  Communicate results and business impacts of insight initiatives to stakeholders within and outside of the Division ', ' Expert in data mining and pre-processing principles and collecting data from multiple data systems, classification, mapping, and structuring/staging ', ' Solid business acumen to put analytics in the appropriate context while identifying key metrics that measure and drive long term growth ', ' Generous vacation time and holiday pay ', ' Establish and promote a clear and transparent framework for developing, testing, and scaling actionable insights resulting in measurable business impact ', ' Strong ability to plan and manage numerous processes, people and projects simultaneously ', ' Oversee the data/report requests process: tracking requests submitted, prioritization, approval, etc.; develop and implement quality controls and departmental standards to ensure quality standards, organizational expectations, and regulatory requirements ', 'Req Number', ' Partner with key stakeholders to champion an insights-driven culture for the entire division; partner with data science and infrastructure peers and operational managers throughout PL to identify data gaps, improve data quality, and share advanced modeling techniques and learnings ', ' Create advanced data models and high-quality analysis for all aspects of our business to discover insights, drive outcomes, actionable recommendations and innovation to guide strategic decisions ', 'Benefits', ' Excellent communication, collaboration and delegation skills with demonstrated ability with both technical and non-technical stakeholders; proven presentation skills, executive presence, and managerial courage to speak at all levels within the organization ', ' 10+ years’ experience with data science and advanced analytics with proven record for delivery of data-driven insights to inform strategic decision making; PhD (preferred) or MS in advanced analytics or quantitative discipline such as Statistics, Math or Engineering, or equivalent industry experience; FSA a plus  Solid business acumen to put analytics in the appropriate context while identifying key metrics that measure and drive long term growth  Expert in data mining and pre-processing principles and collecting data from multiple data systems, classification, mapping, and structuring/staging  Demonstrated familiarity with machine/deep learning algorithms and techniques to support primarily supervised and reinforcement learning such as association rule learning, Bayesian networks, clustering, decision tree learning, gradient boosting, genetic algorithms, learning classifier systems, and support vector machines  Experience and knowledge of statistical modeling techniques: GLM multiple regression, logistic regression, log-linear regression, variable selection, etc.  Experience with machine learning/cloud-based libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, Microsoft Cognitive Toolkit, Kraken, Theano, NumPy, SciPy), programming languages and statistical packages such as SQL, R, Python, SAS (code statements, models and macros), tools such as Alteryx and Data Robot, and data visualization tools such as Tableau. Knowledge of C++ and Java a plus  Experience with big data tools such as Teradata, Aster, Hadoop, Spark, etc.; deep understanding of and experience using analytical concepts and statistical techniques: hypothesis development, designing tests/experiments, analyzing data, drawing conclusions, and developing actionable recommendations for business units  Strong ability to plan and manage numerous processes, people and projects simultaneously  Excellent communication, collaboration and delegation skills with demonstrated ability with both technical and non-technical stakeholders; proven presentation skills, executive presence, and managerial courage to speak at all levels within the organization ', ' Two retirement savings plans: 401k savings plan with company match and Company Retirement Contribution (company-paid) ', ' Manage and optimize processes for data intake, validation, mining and engineering as well as modeling, visualization and communication deliverables ', ' Demonstrated familiarity with machine/deep learning algorithms and techniques to support primarily supervised and reinforcement learning such as association rule learning, Bayesian networks, clustering, decision tree learning, gradient boosting, genetic algorithms, learning classifier systems, and support vector machines ', 'About Pacific Life', ' Experience with machine learning/cloud-based libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, Microsoft Cognitive Toolkit, Kraken, Theano, NumPy, SciPy), programming languages and statistical packages such as SQL, R, Python, SAS (code statements, models and macros), tools such as Alteryx and Data Robot, and data visualization tools such as Tableau. ['\xa0', 'looking for someone to enable product modeling and execute consumer test product evaluations and placement logistics. This will include data entry in excel and / or JMP, consumer use test product preparation and logistics (e.g FAST cycle and consumer use test product sampling, labeling, pack out, shipment to team / test facility, retrieving / returning PPW pallets). Specific deliverables would be: 1. Interacting with Product Development Leaders (PR and Process) 2. Manage sample prep and execution of FAST Cycle Panels including collecting observational data as needed 3. Preparation of prototypes for consumer use test including sampling and pack-out as needed 4. Managing logistics process required for consumer test placement (retrieving / returning PPW pallets, sending product to test facilities or team members residence) 5. Attending consumer test placement as needed 6. Assemble data in table forms in excel, and / or JMP  The preferred candidate will have an AS or BS degree or working towards one and/3 years Products Research experience and would be familiar with Client consumer test placement systems & work processes. Experience with data entry in spread sheets as well as overall proficiency in Microsoft office programs is required. Attention to detail, communication of results along with safe behavior and adherence to TSDC safety and quality expectations is a must. This position will include production, laboratory, and office environments at various client sites and as such travel between sites will be required. ']

['Immunoassay Scientist', '', ' Work closely with other scientists to run a variety of immune cell- and/or serum-based immunoassays with samples generated from Oncology Research project studies (including studies with large sample numbers >100). ', ' Bachelor’s in life sciences, preferably Immunology or a related field, and 0-2 years of experience. Associate degree with 1-2 years of experience will be accepted. ', 'La Jolla, CA', ' Practical experience with the processing of murine splenocytes and/or human blood samples is a plus. ', ' Provide support functions for an immunology lab, including preparation of buffers, ordering and stocking laboratory supplies, and regular maintenance of research instruments and equipment.  Perform and closely monitor FACS acquisition runs lasting up to 4 hours at a time.  Work closely with other scientists to run a variety of immune cell- and/or serum-based immunoassays with samples generated from Oncology Research project studies (including studies with large sample numbers >100).  Define study aims and experimental plans with supervisor and then execute the work following the agreed plans as part of a team effort.  Identify and report any experimental problems, troubleshoot causative factors, and implement necessary corrections following discussion with team members and/or supervisor.  Record experimental work upon completion in electronic notebook systems and archive instrument raw data in server databases. ', ' Identify and report any experimental problems, troubleshoot causative factors, and implement necessary corrections following discussion with team members and/or supervisor. ', ' Perform and closely monitor FACS acquisition runs lasting up to 4 hours at a time. ', '$20-25/hour', ' Record experimental work upon completion in electronic notebook systems and archive instrument raw data in server databases. ', 'Molecular Biologist - Immunoassay Scientist Responsibilities', ' Experience with one or more of the following assays would also be preferable: Flow cytometry, ELISpot, ELISA, MSD, Luminex ', ' Bachelor’s in life sciences, preferably Immunology or a related field, and 0-2 years of experience. Associate degree with 1-2 years of experience will be accepted.  Hands on experience in a relevant laboratory setting with familiarity in aseptic work technique in biological safety cabinets.  Experience with cell culture and aseptic technique is required (can be academic).  Experience with one or more of the following assays would also be preferable: Flow cytometry, ELISpot, ELISA, MSD, Luminex  Practical experience with the processing of murine splenocytes and/or human blood samples is a plus.  Strong team and communication skills are required to work effectively in this role as well as attention to detail and the ability to focus over extended periods of time.', ' Experience with cell culture and aseptic technique is required (can be academic). ', ' Provide support functions for an immunology lab, including preparation of buffers, ordering and stocking laboratory supplies, and regular maintenance of research instruments and equipment. ', 'Molecular Biologist - ', ' Hands on experience in a relevant laboratory setting with familiarity in aseptic work technique in biological safety cabinets. ', ' Strong team and communication skills are required to work effectively in this role as well as attention to detail and the ability to focus over extended periods of time.']

['', 'Data processing platforms such as Spark, Hadoop, etc.', 'We are looking for an experienced Data Engineer on the Healthcare Map / Data Platform team to play a key role in enabling Komodo scalability. In this role, you will have the opportunity to help solve complex challenges and be a part of a great team. Our engineering team is currently about 90 and growing rapidly. You will be able to use one of the biggest, most complete healthcare datasets to solve real world problems that deliver value to clients and positive impact on the world.\xa0Some of the tools we use are: Python, Snowflake, Airflow, AWS EMR, AWS Lambda, Spark, AWS EKS, and Docker.', 'As one of the members of this business-critical team, you will:', 'Basic knowledge (college level or hands on) of machine learning and statistics.', 'Help operate existing data sources', 'Ability to work as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.', 'We Breathe Life Into Data', 'Nice to have:', 'Pipeline scheduling and monitoring systems, like Airflow or Luigi', 'You are an experienced technologist who has a proven track record of designing and building large scale solutions using big data technologies, ideally using Spark, Airflow and Python.\xa0', 'Help architect and implement new data ingestion framework', 'Python development', 'Create automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate the data services and data pipelines.', 'What you bring to Komodo Health:\xa0', 'The Opportunity at Komodo Health', 'At Komodo Health, our mission is to reduce the global burden of disease. Smarter use of data is essential to this mission. We combine the world’s most comprehensive view of patient encounters with innovative algorithms and decades of clinical expertise to power our Healthcare Map, the industry’s most precise view of the U.S. healthcare system. With the Healthcare Map as our foundation, we offer a suite of powerful software applications that deliver exceptional value to the industry.', 'BS/MS in Computer Science, related degrees or relevant technical experience.5-7+ years implementing data engineering and distributed systems.\xa0Building and deploying large-scale, complex data services and data pipelines.Python developmentPipeline scheduling and monitoring systems, like Airflow or LuigiData processing platforms such as Spark, Hadoop, etc.Ability to work as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.Sincere interest in working at a healthcare startup and passion for healthcare data.', 'Write code to ingest new data sources at high scale', 'Our people are the center of our success. We are a smart, supportive team with diverse perspectives and a shared passion for fixing what’s broken in healthcare. It’s fun, challenging and important. Join us!', 'Building and deploying large-scale, complex data services and data pipelines.', '5-7+ years implementing data engineering and distributed systems.\xa0', 'Sincere interest in working at a healthcare startup and passion for healthcare data.', 'BS/MS in Computer Science, related degrees or relevant technical experience.', 'Help architect and implement new data ingestion frameworkWrite code to ingest new data sources at high scaleHelp operate existing data sources', 'Design, develop, and implement distributed data systems using Spark or similar technologies to ingest incoming data at scale.\xa0', 'After three months, you will:\xa0', 'Evaluate new technologies for continuous improvements in Data Engineering.', 'Collaborate with data scientists to implement validation and/or data quality enhancements.', 'Design, develop, and implement distributed data systems using Spark or similar technologies to ingest incoming data at scale.\xa0Create automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate the data services and data pipelines.Evaluate new technologies for continuous improvements in Data Engineering.Collaborate with data scientists to implement validation and/or data quality enhancements.']

['', 'Ability to communicate with both technical and non-technical users', "As Senior Data Engineer - Agent Compensation on the Data Engineering Team, you will be part of the team that owns Redfin's data automation platform, data warehouse, and agent pay system.
